Question.Subject: what is the internet?
Question.Content: i know the general reason for the internet. but still don't understand it. is the internet a cybernetic spider web connecting everyone to each other?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Basically just all the computers connected to each other. A server is what host websites, but it's also essentially a computer, just not in the normal sense. So, yes, your guess was right. It's a bit more complicated than that, but you get the idea.

Answer.Content: Basically just all the computers connected to each other. A server is what host websites, but it's also essentially a computer, just not in the normal sense. So, yes, your guess was right. It's a bit more complicated than that, but you get the idea.
the interwebs is a big spiderweb that connects all the neckbeards and C.P sharers together
